pages.text: Put one tree next to another tree near some bees, profit.$(br)The hive can be simulated and range upgrades increase the working area by 2 blocks per upgrade. Base range is 4.$(br2)Please note that this mod is in beta and not feature complete.$(br)Specifically the growth features for the trees (how they look when grown) are under development.

Put one tree next to another tree near some bees, profit.$(br)You can also collect leaves and run them through a pollen sifter to extract pollen. Use the pollen balls on a leaf to pollinate it and get a new tree species.$(br2)Please not that this mod is in beta and not feature complete.$(br1)Specifically the growth features for the trees (how they look when grown) are under development.

If you use bees you need to make sure that the leaves of the two trees you want to breed are withing 4 blocks of the beenest/hive and that the bees have flowers nearby. Each trip to the hive from the flower will trigger a pollination attempt on a nearby leaf.
You can use a spyglass to better spot which leaves have been pollinated.
